name: Tessel8
description:
Welcome!

This is a early version of the game. Therefore, I haven't put in very many
in-game tutorials or descriptions of what to do. Read on for a list of controls.

At this point the goal is to survive as long as possible. Can you fend off the horde of alien slimes hungry for your demise?

Controls:

    A - Move left

    D - Move right

    Space - Jump

    Left Mouse Click - Attack

    Right Mouse Hold - Turn on teleport mode

    Right Mouse Hold + Left Mouse Click - Teleport to selected area*

*Note: When teleporting, it can only be on top of walkable terrain. While teleport mode is active
a ring will appear showing the valid teleport radius you can look within. Moving your mouse cursor over
walkable terrain while the ring is visible will cause a blue teleport-y marker to pop-up showing you that 
this is a valid spot to teleport onto.
